import React, { useState } from "react"; import imagePath from "../constants/imagePath"; import InputField from "./InputField"; import "./Form.css"; import ButtonField from "./ButtonField"; interface FormProps { employeeData?:any; heading?:any; handleInputChange?: (field: any) => (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; handleProfileChange?: (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; handleResumeChange?: (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; onSave?: () => void; } const AddEmployeeForm : React.FC = ({ heading, employeeData, handleProfileChange, handleResumeChange, handleInputChange, onSave })=> { return (
{heading}
General Information
Contact Information
Employee Information
); }; export default AddEmployeeForm;
